      • checkIfUserIsAdmin

        boolean checkIfUserIsAdmin(UserManager um,
                           java.lang.String userId)
                    throws RepositoryException
        Check if the specified user id belong to the community administrator group.
        Parameters:
        um - is user manager
        userId - is user id
        Returns:
        true/false if user is community admin user or not
        Throws:
        RepositoryException - is unexpected repository exception
        See Also:
        to verify if the specified user is a group administrator.

      • checkIfUserIsGroupAdmin

        boolean checkIfUserIsGroupAdmin(UserManager um,
                                java.lang.String userId)
                         throws RepositoryException
        Check if the specified user id belong to the group admin or not.
        Parameters:
        um - is user manager
        userId - is user id
        Returns:
        true/false if user is group admin or not
        Throws:
        RepositoryException - is unexpected repository exception

      • isUserAdmin

        boolean isUserAdmin(UserManager um,
                    java.lang.String userId)
             throws RepositoryException
        Check if the specified user id is an administrator base on this context. If the context has a group, it checks if the user is a group administrator, otherwise, it checks if the user is a community administrator.
        Parameters:
        um - is user manager
        userId - is user id
        Returns:
        true/false if user is admin user or not
        Throws:
        RepositoryException - is unexpected repository exception

        Return the social configuration associated with the tenant.
        Returns:
